name: Hairy Mons - FREE Cloro Match Connect Puzzle Pipe Fun Game
name_original: Hairy Mons - FREE Cloro Match Connect Puzzle Pipe Fun Game
description:
HairMons is a simple yet adjective puzzle Match game

Connect matching the HairMons colors to create a line.
Pair all colors, and you must cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. Need to play more advance LEVELS
Need to unlock
While conencting need to watch out not to brake the line if you cross over.

Free play hundreds of levels.
Race against the clock solve as much puzzles in Time Trial.
Hints, More level packs available “require in App Purchase”


Features:
- 10 different board size.
- Retina display with nice colors.
- Over hundreds of free levels.
- Fun Sound effects.
- 30 second up to 4 minutes Time Trial to choose from with any board size.
- Optimized for iPhone, iPod, iPad and iPhone 5
